results.title: Left ventricular adaptation to chronic pressure overload induced by inhibition of nitric oxide synthase in rats.
results.text_hl: Also, we analyzed the effect of the angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor (ACEI), @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, in this experimental model of @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@ventricular pressure overload@@@.

citations.NLM: Matsubara BB, Matsubara LS, Zornoff LA, Franco M, Janicki JS. Left ventricular adaptation to chronic pressure overload induced by inhibition of nitric oxide synthase in rats. Basic Res Cardiol. 1998 Jun;93(3):173-81. PMID: 9689443
citations.BibTeX: @article{9689443, title={Left ventricular adaptation to chronic pressure overload induced by inhibition of nitric oxide synthase in rats.}, author={Matsubara BB and Matsubara LS and Zornoff LA and Franco M and Janicki JS}, journal={Basic Res Cardiol}, volume={93}, number={3}, pages={173-81}}

results.title: Renoprevention: A new concept for reengineering nephrology care--an economic impact and patient outcome analysis of two hypothetical patient management paradigms in the CCU.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patient@@@ B continued on @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ 40 mg QD, experienced prolonged @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ needing pressors-severe oliguric @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@volume overload@@@, daily RRT for 6 days, recovered kidney function, was discharged after 20 days.

citations.NLM: Onuigbo MA. Renoprevention: A new concept for reengineering nephrology care--an economic impact and patient outcome analysis of two hypothetical patient management paradigms in the CCU. Ren Fail. 2013;35(1):23-8. PMID: 23151177
citations.BibTeX: @article{23151177, title={Renoprevention: A new concept for reengineering nephrology care--an economic impact and patient outcome analysis of two hypothetical patient management paradigms in the CCU.}, author={Onuigbo MA}, journal={Ren Fail}, volume={35}, number={1}, pages={23-8}}
